name: BodSix
tag_list: iphone, real-world-gaming, location-based-gaming, gps, ipod-touch, location-based-services, location-based, check-in, avatar, mobile, mobile-games, social-game, social-games
overview:
BodSix develops free-to-play mobile games that combine social game play with location-based services. Inspired by mapping technology as much as its passion for games, BodSix adds a new location dimension to traditional social games. It’s first title is expected for release in early fall 2011 on the iOS mobile platform.

The company has assembled some of the best talent in the game industry. The company’s game design is under the direction of Richard Garfield, creator of Magic: The Gathering, and is supported by a seasoned team of artists and developers.

The company is based in Seattle, WA, and is privately funded.
